title: Eltima SWF & FLV Toolbox 3.5.17.252 [h33t] [pmsyb]
description:
Eltima SWF & FLV Toolbox 3.5.17.252



Convert FLV or SWF to AVI, GIF and frame-by-frame JPEG/GIF/BMP


SWF & FLV Toolbox is a treat for every computer user and Internet surfer! Our FLV & SWF converter makes it a  breeze converting Adobe Flash (SWF) and Flash Video (FLV) files into popular graphic and video formats.

SWF & FLV Toolbox provides you with a numerous features and allows converting SWF and FLV files in such formats:

* convert FLV or SWF to AVI video
* convert SWF files and FLV into Projector executable file
* convert SWF/FLV/Projector EXE file into screensaver
* convert FLV/EXE or SWF to GIF (animated)
* convert SWF/FLV file into a set of images (JPG/GIF/BMP)
* convert FLV to SWF


With SWF & FLV Toolbox you are just one click away from the conversion result you always wanted.
 With SWF & FLV Toolbox you can:Convert FLV or SWF to AVI format
You may capture your SWF/FLV files and convert them into AVI movie format using any codec installed in your system. To add more, SWF & FLV Toolbox offers an impressive option to capture your interactive SWF file into a movie, making a step-by-step visual presentation simple and real fun, or record your progress in Flash games, for instance.

 
SWF & FLV files into Advanced Flash Player
 Now users don't need to install Flash player into their systems since Advanced Player, which is the key feature of SWF & FLV Toolbox, is bundled with necessary library which enables users to view SWF/FLV movies even without installing Flash Player OCX into their systems. Additionally Advanced Flash Player lets you add navigation controls, customize right-click menu, all icons and captions and protect your Flash movies from decompilation.
 

Convert Flash to image series or single animated GIF
 SWF & FLV Toolbox can convert any SWF / FLV file into many graphic formats, such as JPG, BMP, GIF. More than that, SWF & FLV Toolbox allows converting SWF or FLV into a single animated GIF file, so you can publish it on the web, thus saving loading time and giving everyone the chance to see it.

 
Full features list:

* Convert SWF/FLV movies into AVI, animated GIF, frame-by-frame JPEG/GIF/BMP, Projector EXE files 
* Convert SWF/FLV/Projector EXE files one-by-one or in a batch 
* Convert SWF into video (AVI). Note that MP3 is the only sound format supported for frame-by-frame video  conversion 
* Create Advanced Flash Players with navigation controls and other cool features 
* Capture interactive as well as non-interactive Flash movies into Video files in a single-click of a button 
* Unlock protected SWF files 
* Add cool movie controls to FLV files converting them to handy SWF Player 
* Protect your SWF files from being opened and viewed in Flash Studio 
* FLV to Video conversion 
* Create exclusive screensavers from any SWF/FLV/Projector EXE file and add your homepage address, e-mail address, title, etc to its settings 
* Convert Projector EXE files back into SWF 
* Modify Advanced Flash Player caption, icon, cursor, version information, window size and location, expiration date etc. 
* Advanced Flash Player renders Flash movies without storing intermediate files on disk making it impossible to grab SWF file from the executable, which makes it a great solution to prevent decompiling your SWF movies 
* Add unique zooming control to Advanced Flash Player file 
* Advanced Player files cannot be decompiled 
* Adjust optimization settings for JPEG, apply different color schemes for GIF, select the desired frame rate for AVI files and lots more 
* Additional compression allows achieving lowest ever executable file sizes 
* Force Zlib compression and reduce your SWF/FLV files' size 
* Your users no longer need to have Adobe Flash player installed to view Flash animation 
* Onscreen preview of the selected files 
* User-friendly innovative user interface 
* Full Drag-and-Drop support 

                              <a href=" http://www.eltima.com/products/swf-tools/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.eltima.com/products/swf-tools/</a>

Installation 
Unpack Eltima SWF & FLV Toolbox 3.5.17.252.rar
Run swf_toolboxsetup.exe
Copy "ArmAccess.dll" and "swf_toolbox.exe" files to "C:Program FilesEltima SoftwareSWF & FLV Toolbox" folder and overwrite the originals.
Demo included.

                            !!!!!!!!!! ENJOY !!!!!!!!!!
